                  const checkValue = value =>
                    value?.startsWith?.(
                      'https://qq.crunchyroll.com/v1'
                    );
                  const getURLValue = arg => arg instanceof URL && arg.origin;
                  const getRequestValue = arg => arg instanceof Request && arg.url;

                  const originalFetch = window.fetch;

                  window.fetch = function (arg, options = {}) {
                    try {
                      if (checkValue(getURLValue(arg) || getRequestValue(arg) || arg)) {
                        options.credentials = 'include';
                      }

                      return originalFetch(arg, options);
                    } catch (e) {
                      console.error('Error in fetch fix', e);

                      return originalFetch(arg, options);
                    }
                  };

Card</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div><div class="footer-content-wrapper--MpCtF footer-about-crunchyroll-anonymous--joo5e"><div><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL-">Welcome to Crunchyroll, your ultimate destination for streaming anime and the best in anime entertainment. Whether you’re a lifelong fan or just starting your anime journey, Crunchyroll offers an extensive library of top-tier anime series and anime movies. From action-packed adventures like Naruto and One Piece to fan-favorites such as Demon Slayer, Solo Leveling, and Attack on Titan, we bring the world of anime right to your screen. With thousands of hours of content, you’ll find something for every mood and taste, whether you’re into heart-pounding action, touching romance, or gripping mysteries.</p><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL-">At Crunchyroll, we take pride in being the go-to platform for anime lovers around the world. You can dive into a wide variety of anime genres, including fantasy, slice of life, and sci-fi, ensuring there’s always something new to discover.</p><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL-">With simulcasts straight from Japan, you’ll never miss a moment of the latest and greatest new anime releases. Our selection goes beyond just series—enjoy a handpicked selection of anime movies that showcase the best in animation and storytelling. Watch anime anytime, anywhere, with the Crunchyroll app available across all your devices.</p><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL-">Beyond streaming, Crunchyroll is a hub for all things anime. Explore the Crunchyroll Store for exclusive anime merchandise, collectibles, and apparel. Stay updated with Crunchyroll News, delivering the latest on anime, manga, and pop culture. And for gamers, Crunchyroll Games brings your favorite anime worlds to life in exciting and interactive ways. Join the Crunchyroll community and immerse yourself in a world where anime is more than just a genre—it’s a lifestyle.</p></div></div><div class="footer-horizontal-layout--wVaTp"><img src="https://www.crunchyroll.com/build/assets/img/footer/footer-bg.png" alt="" class="footer-horizontal-layout__image--iCc3p"/><div class="footer-content-wrapper--MpCtF"><ul class="footer-horizontal-layout__wrapper--ATSE5"><li class="footer-nav-item--lm-fq"><a aria-label="Terms of Use -                   const checkValue = value =>
                    value?.startsWith?.(
                      'https://qq.crunchyroll.com/v1'
                    );
                  const getURLValue = arg => arg instanceof URL && arg.origin;
                  const getRequestValue = arg => arg instanceof Request && arg.url;

                  const originalFetch = window.fetch;

                  window.fetch = function (arg, options = {}) {
                    try {
                      if (checkValue(getURLValue(arg) || getRequestValue(arg) || arg)) {
                        options.credentials = 'include';
                      }

                      return originalFetch(arg, options);
                    } catch (e) {
                      console.error('Error in fetch fix', e);

                      return originalFetch(arg, options);
                    }
                  };

class="about-crunchyroll-container"><div class="about-crunchyroll-column"><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL- about-crunchyroll-text">Welcome to Crunchyroll, your ultimate destination for streaming anime and the best in anime entertainment. Whether you’re a lifelong fan or just starting your anime journey, Crunchyroll offers an extensive library of top-tier anime series and anime movies. From action-packed adventures like Naruto and One Piece to fan-favorites such as Demon Slayer, Solo Leveling, and Attack on Titan, we bring the world of anime right to your screen. With thousands of hours of content, you’ll find something for every mood and taste, whether you’re into heart-pounding action, touching romance, or gripping mysteries.</p><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL- about-crunchyroll-text">At Crunchyroll, we take pride in being the go-to platform for anime lovers around the world. You can dive into a wide variety of anime genres, including fantasy, slice of life, and sci-fi, ensuring there’s always something new to discover.</p></div><div class="about-crunchyroll-column"><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL- about-crunchyroll-text">With simulcasts straight from Japan, you’ll never miss a moment of the latest and greatest new anime releases. Our selection goes beyond just series—enjoy a handpicked selection of anime movies that showcase the best in animation and storytelling. Watch anime anytime, anywhere, with the Crunchyroll app available across all your devices.</p><p class="text--gq6o- text--is-m--pqiL- about-crunchyroll-text">Beyond streaming, Crunchyroll is a hub for all things anime. Explore the Crunchyroll Store for exclusive anime merchandise, collectibles, and apparel. Stay updated with Crunchyroll News, delivering the latest on anime, manga, and pop culture. And for gamers, Crunchyroll Games brings your favorite anime worlds to life in exciting and interactive ways.
